title: [Large-Scale] Instructional Design Technology (IDT) Application Workshop for Expanding Psychotherapy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic psychological therapy theories and clinical experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training program for current professionals to enhance evidence-based psychotherapy (EBTs) dissemination capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can design a psychological therapy education program utilizing the IDT (Instructional Design and Technology) framework.
Learners can develop formative assessment tools to evaluate the effectiveness of Educational Science Technologies (ESTs) in blended learning environments.
Learners can propose ethical implementation strategies for educational technologies under the scientist-practitioner collaboration model.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
